availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William R. Mason (Judge of the Hancock County, KY, Court)

body.p: Hawesville, Kentucky, judge and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Henderson Mason. Sheriff of Hancock County, Kentucky, in 1849. Judge in Hawesville in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Hancock County in 1860. Judge of the Hancock County Court in Hancock County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 134.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 11.
